text: Any Given Sunday is a 1999 American drama movie. It was directed by Oliver Stone and was produced by Richard Donner, Oliver Stone, Dan Halsted, Lauren Shuler Donner, and Clayton Townsend. Any Given Sunday was released on November 10, 1999. The movie is based on the Pat Toomay novel, On Any Given Sunday. The movie gained mixed reviews from critics and holds a 50% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. == Cast == *Al Pacino as Tony D'Amato *Cameron Diaz as Christina Pagniacci *Dennis Quaid as Jack "Cap" Rooney *James Woods as Dr. Harvey Mandrake *Jamie Foxx as "Steamin" Willie Beamen *LL Cool J as Julian "J-Man" Washington *Lawrence Taylor as Luther "Shark" Lavay *Jim Brown as Montezuma Monroe *Aaron Eckhart as Nick Crozier *Matthew Modine as Dr. Oliver "Ollie" Powers *John C. McGinley as Jack Rose *Lela Rochon as Vanessa Struthers *Lauren Holly as Cindy Rooney *Ann-Margret as Margaret Pagniacci *Elizabeth Berkley as Mandy Murphy *Charlton Heston as Commissioner *Clifton Davis as Mayor Tyrone Smalls ==Production== ===Principal photography=== The film was shot in Miami, Florida and Irving, Texas in December 14, 1998 to March 6, 1999. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Oliver Stone Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Any Given Sunday
